phrases: Typhoon 13 is maintaining its extremely strong force
as it continues making its way up north.
The storm area struck South Daitou Island last night at around 11 p.m.
As of now, the effect on transportation in all areas...
The TV says the Shinkansen is pooping!
They probably said, The Shinkansen is operating on normal schedules.
That means it is running same as usual.
I am going to go poop!
Typhoon 13 has changed course and is gradually moving east,
where it is expected to make landfall in the Tokai area
sometime between this evening and tonight.
She said there is a typhoon!
You should see how much I am making!
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
I will pick you up early today.
We are going to be late.
If you leave just enough space for the circles,
it means you have written it in a cool way.
Sensei, how much is just enough?
You do not have to draw these circles!
All right, the rest will be your homework.
For the next activity, all the first-graders are going to draw.
Meet up outside in front of your own morning glory.
It is still morning and I am already beat...
And it had to be on a day like today that we have got tons of samples to ship...
If I waited'til they got bigger, the insurance would not mean a thing.
Even though I kind of doubt he will be college material, being my kid...
We got two, so it is pretty tight.
Ours is still a little squirt, so we got day-care fees too,
which is nothing to sneeze at.
And he outgrows his clothes like that...
Well, we are only contract employees, but it helps
that the welfare pension program and health insurance are included.
My wife took care of that behind my back.
For mine, the payout is decent if I kick the bucket,
but she has universal life insurance.
You guys really are Dads, are not you?
There is nothing to be impressed about.
I wonder how much insurance costs...
The brat next door is so frickin' noisy, we want to move,
but the money just are not there.
Yeah, I do not even know what I am workin' for...
Take a good look at us!
You get married, this is what happens!
I do not have a girlfriend, so no danger of that.
They are always bitching and moaning, and yet...
Deep down, there is a sense of security...
I cannot imagine them becoming like Rin's mother.
The ground is flat, so I do not need it.
That is not going to float!
When I tell you to bring something, you bring it!
Wow, your drawing is really good, Rin-chan!
The colors of this flower and this flower are slightly different,
and Rin-san's drawing shows that with both bluish and purplish colors.
Kouki-kun and those boys are wandering around again.
Right now, it is drawing time.
Kouki-san, your morning glories are looking splendid!
It would be a waste not to sketch them.
I am in charge of this boy.
Kouki-san, why do you always, always disturb everyone?!
And do not make a weird face!
Do not let them get you in trouble!
Kouki-kun always does strange stuff and he is scary when he loses his temper.
After all, we went to the same nursery school.
You guys pick up your kids at 6 too, right?
Let us get it done in one!
You got a little wet, huh?
The wind's really picked up, huh?
I wish I could have gotten here earlier, but...
I am sorry, but it is already decided how he gets home, so we cannot...
But the wind is only to keep getting stronger,
so let me try calling Nitani-san and see if it would be a problem.
Then, just to confirm, can I hand the phone over to you?
We can go home early, too!
Get behind me and follow along!
I will bring you a towel.
Careful, do not catch your fingers.
Y'know, it is kind of like a secret base!
I am going to rinse it now, so do not open your eyes.
All right, dry the rest yourself.
So you were able to get off work early...
I feel like I overstepped my bounds.
Kouki got soaked on the way here, too.
Really, I do not know where to begin to apologize...
Yeah, I am more comfortable with that.
Rin-chan, you are good at that!
I can use a knife, too!
You are already a young lady!
I will lend you my knife!
It looks delicious, does not it?
Well, I am sure they will taste fine.
You are so good at that!
Kouki, do you love your mom?
If only she were not such an old nag...
There is a sense of security here, too.
Thank you for the food we are about to eat!
Thank you for the food we are about to eat!
I know, I am just getting it together.
It is good, is not it?!
Food tastes better when we eat it together!
Let us eat here again tomorrow night!
And then it hit him right in the head!
I was never able to give him this kind of opportunity'til now.
I am so happy about this evening.
Sensei said we did not need those circles!
Being able to see that face...
I am glad I got off work early.
She is raising a child alone, too...
Well, I think it is about time...
Why do not you stay over?
After all, Reina-chan and her mom stayed over.
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I am already high, high, high
I wanted to open the storm windows...
Not a cloud in the sky!
Kouki-kun, we are going to be late!
